events.title: Leeds Tech Hub - Lean UX, Analytics and Performance
events.description:
Jeff Gothelf, author of the O'Reilly book “Lean UX: Applying lean principles to improve user experience”, takes a look at what he’s learned in the past 5 years, how his own thinking has evolved and what the future of great team collaboration and product development looks like.

Jonny Longden talks about the ways in which Sky is transferring culture and structure to embed analytics in agile so that performance improvement is both data driven and firmly owned by the agile team.

events.title: MongoDB Days UK 2015
events.description:
Tom Maule talks about how NOW TV has scaled MongoDB for High Load Events

NOW TV’s customer base has tripled year on year, and linear event streaming has become a greater and greater percentage of their viewing. This talk will take you through the lessons we learnt following one unfortunate event in 2014 which led NOW TV to catastrophic failure, and the improvements and scalability challenges we were faced with when preparing for the same event just 1 year later. Hear how we turned our entire failure case behaviour on its head; from always failing in favour of NOW TV, to failing in favour of the customer. Learn how we ensure that high availability of video assets on the CDN ensures continued playout irrespective of the state of our application servers.

events.title: Silicon Milkroundabout
events.description:
Sky will be attending Silicon Milkroundabout on Sunday 15th November, hiring for 4 jobs:

  • Senior Front End Developers
  • Senior and Midlevel Android Developers
  • Principal, Senior and Midlevel Java Developers
  • Senior iOS Developer

events.title: Apps-World Europe 2015
events.description:
Fu Ho Lee & Benjamin Tomlinson talk about creating a successful approach to UX and UI

  • The creative, technical and operational processes around developing and deploying an innovative, holistic and future-proof mobile UX strategy
  • Porting desktop experiences to mobile, and compare this to designing mobile experiences from the ground up
  • How to deliver genuine innovation and value to consumers

events.title: TechCrunch Disrupt
events.description:
Sky will be at TechCrunch Disrupt, the world's leading authority in debuting revolutionary startups, introducing game-changing technologies, and discussing what’s top of mind for the tech industry’s key innovators.

Across the four days, Sky will be engaging with the Tech community, along with being a sponsor at the renowned hackathon.

events.title: Scala eXchange
events.description: Scala eXchange is Europe's largest community conference on Scala. Leading experts will attend to give their insights and to share their skills with the Scala community.

events.title: Women of Silicon Roundabout
events.description: Sky will be in attendance, and are sponsoring the Women of Silicon Roundabout event, which focuses on the barriers and challenges that women face in the industry, along with how these obstacles can be overcome.
